website_summaries.verdict: For users who need a compact ironing board with a small footprint, this is an excellent choice.
pros: Fits nicely on most tabletops, making it ideal for consumers with limited space
cons: Awkward when it comes to ironing large items

customer_reviews.title: Pad is Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: This ironing board is a great size to keep in my sewing room, but it comes with a very thin pad that allows the metal grid underneath to show through on fabric. I took off the cover and used the thin batting as a pattern to cut another pad out of heat resistant batting (the kind used for potholders). With both pads in place, it works great for my sewing and quilting projects.
customer_reviews.author: KTraxTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons....
customer_reviews.text: I have used it mostly for ironing quilt blocks as I sew them. The table itself is sturdy enough but the iron rest feels flimsy and I don’t trust that it won’t fail. The cover is way way too thin and unless you want to scorch what you are pressing you had better put quilt batting underneath. IKEA has a better product for less cost. This board is adequate but just some design flaws. It folds very easily and is easy to hang in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Suzee Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: FIRST thing I notice, is the sturdy metal mesh construction of the board (main reason for my purchase), not cheap wood or compressed cardboard like others. SECOND thing I immediately notice is that the padding under the cover is NOT "thick fiber pad" as promised in the description, it is VERY THIN, so thin that you can easily feel/see the mesh beneath it. Will need to buy a replacement pad of better quality; ironing on this surface with press the mesh imprint into your clothes. Other than that, the general overall quality seems serviceable for light ironing needs.
customer_reviews.author: MARLA

customer_reviews.title: Collapses when you iron!
customer_reviews.text: What is the secret to making this thing stay upright? I'm unable to lock it in place or hook, what looks like it might be the hook, to the armature so that it will stay up. If you iron too close to the back then it falls down. I'm not mechanically challenged. What am I missing??
customer_reviews.author: Lissi

customer_reviews.title: This review is for the Household Essentials Steel Table Top ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Household Essentials Steel Table Top Small Ironing Board with Iron Rest, 12-Inch x 30-Inch You really get a lot for your money here. Solid steel. No fiber or particle board. Very stable. Pad needs to be thicker, but other than that no negatives
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Cover and Stability
customer_reviews.text: Heads up Quilters! I wanted an small ironing board that I could use with steam. This one fit the requirements because it has a steel mesh under the cover to prevent warping of the board. After a little use, I found the ironing board cover to be very thin and not up to allot of use. Second, when you place the iron into the holder it tends to fall back because of the weight of the iron. Too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Very good! Not without its issues.
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job, love that it can be stored hanging over our closet door. My only gripe is that the padding is quite thin (though it hasn’t caused a mesh printing issue yet) and the iron rack slides out with gravity when stored. Won’t stay in while stored in hanging position. Ah well. The thing works.
customer_reviews.author: Mel M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I am on a military base in Northern Afghanistan and the laundry service here is commonly known as the "Wash and Wad". Space was a real issue and I was fed up with wearing wrinkled clothes. Got this in and it is small enough I can use it in what little space I have, but it still is big enough to really get the job done. Coupled with the slide out iron rack I am really happy with this purchase. If space is an issue and you need an ironing board, you cant go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Where is Quality Assurance, Amazon? Product damaged and incomplete. Returning it. Shame on you.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without door hook and cover is ripped on side.
customer_reviews.author: Amore01

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ironing board for me
customer_reviews.text: The perfect ironing board for me. I rarely iron so this small ironing board folds away easily without taking up too much space. It's easy to pull out, set up, and sturdy enough to do the job. It's convenient to have the side iron rest, too. The only downside is that the ironing pad isn't thick enough. But, for me, that's not enough of an issue to take away a star. I just folded an old towel to put under the pad provided, but I'm sure for someone that irons a little more than me, they can just purchase an extra pad.
customer_reviews.author: SSmith27

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it twice and the iron holder ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it twice and the iron holder already broke! My iron is a regular sized iron...
customer_reviews.author: YVO

customer_reviews.title: Light and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small home, sturdy enough to use on small projects. Easily accessible has it can be hung or placed on a shelf folded. Also sits well and locks to be used on table top. The padding is thin and wish it had a little more but it does what it is intended to do. The iron resting rack is decent.
customer_reviews.author: C&L Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy the ironing board pad suggested with this product. Alone, there basically is no pad and as other reviews mention, you would sear the mesh pattern into your clothes. I bought both together because of those before me and haven't had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: CoveGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I needed a new one but didn’t want to take up space with a full size ironing board. I use it for my sewing projects. Don’t drop it on your foot! I did and had a swollen sore foot for 8 days! Shows how sturdy it is! Lol
customer_reviews.author: L Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old presswood ironing board (which was awful, by the way. It started warping/bending in the middle and was very flimsy). This board is sturdy and doesn't wobble or bend. As other reviewers have stated, the cover is very thin. I bought the blue silicone cover and am using it in addition to the cotton one this board came with. Now there's extra padding and the blue cover fits well. I wouldn't recommend it for long shirts/skirts/dresses, but it's great for small items
customer_reviews.author: Kuzdemmer

customer_reviews.title: Frame sturdy but cover poor
customer_reviews.text: The frame is pretty sturdy but the cover pad is loose and low quality. Purchased for a rental and will not get a lot of use, hoping it will hold up for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it except for the fact that
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small ironing board for touch ups and minor sewing projects. I am happy with it except for the fact that, as a small older woman, I am unable to get the brace into position. I've had to have my husband put the brace in place and I just have to leave it ready to use instead of folding it up every time after use. That's a bit disappointing, but doable. I did buy an extra pad and cover to put on it and I'm glad I did. The one that came with it is rather thin. It's sturdy with the brace in place and just what I needed for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Not as useful as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be perfect for me to use when sewing, and ironing seams instead of having my regular ironing board in the way, This surface is just too small to do much of anything, and the pad is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: vivian lee ford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect small ironing board on the go or in a craft room. Easily stored away and when in use even has an iron rest! Great for table too, floor or where ever you need. Perfect product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Springer

customer_reviews.title: Compact board good for apt life
customer_reviews.text: Living in an apartment im always attempting to save space. This is a good buy for just that. Included is a small hanger for the board so you can hang it on a door. The stand is sturdy but my only complaint being the wire holder for the iron is cheap and will flip the board due to the iron being to heavy compared to the weight of the board
customer_reviews.author: Rusty johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke during set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular ironing board because of the size and the iron rest. The iron rest was poorly soldered to the frame and broke immediately. I like the size, but am disappointed in the flimsy iron rest.
customer_reviews.author: FLA2600

customer_reviews.title: Could be a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness and functionality. The unit I received has a bent arm that holds the board in place while ironing. Other than that, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: DAnne

customer_reviews.title: Good product for occasional use!
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. As stated in other reviews, the pad is kinda thin but OK for me. I love that it came with a hook to hang over the door when folded. The only complaint I have is that after the second use, the iron rest would slowly slide out when hanging, but this is no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm short on space in our home. I purchased this table top ironing board since I knew I wouldn't be using it all the time. It's simply for sewing projects and the occasional pressing of a dress shirt. It's exactly what was needed. And I love that I can tuck it away out of sight or hang it behind my laundry room door.
customer_reviews.author: Mamainstitches

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: The foldaway miniature table doesn’t completely connect one of the legs into the corresponding recess.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Gibson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a thing of beauty!!! Well designed! Works great! I'll never buy a full-size board again!
customer_reviews.author: MCE.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, expected, and received
customer_reviews.text: In the era of easy-wash fabrics, I had no need for my old, big, clumsy ironing board with its scorched and torn cover. This portable table-top fit my needs precisely. I immediately unpacked it, placed it on the kitchen island, and pressed my two recently-purchased wrinkled tops that had been languishing in the closet. I chose one for my outfit du jour and went to meet the ladies for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Em

customer_reviews.title: Good Things!
customer_reviews.text: It is compact and good. Hook for storage is also included and it is wonderful. A little disappointing is that the cover moves.
customer_reviews.author: FUSAKONOMURA

customer_reviews.title: Ironing is against my religion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my apartment. Happy to get rid of my big ironing board. This one is very adequate for the little bit of ironing I do. Hangs on the back of a door.
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ironing board is light weight and fits easily on a solid surface.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Ironing board!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace one that was made of what looks like particle board. The old one broke and really was not well made. I love this new ironing board. I use it when I sew and the iron rest is very sturdy and works well. Easy to fold and store. Highly recommend The cover is a bit thin but I do not use it fir heavy ironing, just light work light seams and hems, but you certainly could use for shirts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Angelfish

customer_reviews.title: I want to return it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were on vacation, and that is what I bought this portable ironing board for, but I never used it. It is still in the box. I just went to return it, and the last date to return it was Aug 19th. I’m disappointed. Couldn’t tell you if product is good or bad! Wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small space ironing
customer_reviews.text: Def like the compact size. Still need to get a cover for this
customer_reviews.author: MzSerena

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those occasions you want to do a quick press and don’t want to drag out the full-size board.
customer_reviews.author: TedVTID

customer_reviews.title: Household Essentials Steel Iron Board
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty stable but wish it had additional locking to make it more sturdy on smaller surfaces like tables etc, or on a furniture. But it gets the job done when needed!
customer_reviews.author: mulcahyd

customer_reviews.title: convenient design
customer_reviews.text: design is good but the fabric is so thin. It became yellow once I used it.
customer_reviews.author: HYun

customer_reviews.title: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND FOR USE ON DELICATE OR SLICK
customer_reviews.text: IDEAL FOR SMALL SPACES. I USE IT ON BATHROOM COUNTER.WOULD NOT RECOMMEND FOR USE ON DELICATE OR SLICK, SURFACE WITHOUT ADDING SOME PADDING.
customer_reviews.author: rodolfo Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Table Top Ironing Board with Iron Rest
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the service and delivery of this item. It works like a charm. I will buy from this seller again. I am very happy, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Super Mario

customer_reviews.title: Handy, easy to store, use on bed or table. Stores easily.
customer_reviews.text: Handy, easy to store, use on bed or table. Stores easily. Also, easy to open and close...
customer_reviews.author: ebk02

customer_reviews.title: Great ironing board for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I'm in a small apartment with no space to set up a full sized ironing board. I can put this on my table and it works great. I've not had any issue with the mesh pattern being ironed into the fabric. I'm about halfway through sewing a dress and its worked fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: commune

customer_reviews.title: This was requested for a gift. I actually never ...
customer_reviews.text: This was requested for a gift. I actually never tried this one myself. As far as I know she has had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small small spaces and light ironing.
customer_reviews.text: It was nice just smaller than I expected It is made very well yet I needed to return it because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T

customer_reviews.title: Nice for tight spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. I don't have room for a big ironing board and this fits on top of my washer and I use it for items that I sew. I generally don't iron clothes - iron is a nasty four letter word to me. But this serves me well for pressing open seams and taking the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thick enough and well made. Easy to iron on this bad boy
customer_reviews.author: Justicerho

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I just don't iron much but still wanted to have an ironing board for when I do. I replaced the old monster with this one that I am able to hang up in the laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: JH in NH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best thing ever. Able to do shirts and get into small places with a very small imprint
customer_reviews.author: LILVARM

customer_reviews.title: Its fine
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but a little short and the iron holder slides out when hung on wall. Also collapses a little too easy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just smaller!
customer_reviews.text: All the convenience of a large ironing board just smaller, tabletop size. Great!
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but was bent and very hard to open or fold. It's a 2 person effort since its not aligned properly.
customer_reviews.author: RhondaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy steel made and support and will lasts long
customer_reviews.text: I used this right away and very helpful using especially when ironing on top of your bed. Sturdy steel made and support and will lasts long! Just ensure to order and extra cover to provide cushion when ironing your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: MC Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i fx'd my right shoulder and this will work out fine
customer_reviews.author: bobbie

customer_reviews.title: I have this a three star because the table cloth ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this a three star because the table cloth is very flimsy. I'm planning on getting a new table cloth because the one covering the ironing board is too thin and appears add though I'm ironing on frame
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great structure!
customer_reviews.text: This a a very sturdy ironing board for a table top board. It is made of sturdy metal rather than plastic. I ordered a Teflon padded cover and I love it. I left the original cover on as well. I found much lesser quality boards for the same price. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Tundra

customer_reviews.title: Nit comfortable because it has to be held while
customer_reviews.text: Slides when being use. Nit comfortable because it has to be held while rtoning

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Exacting what I was looking for. Wish it had cute covers I could buy.

customer_reviews.title: Great little ironing board for applications with limited storage space
customer_reviews.text: Great little ironing board for applications with limited storage space. We put it on top of the stacked washer/dryer and bring down and place on a table when needed. Excellent for small apartments.
customer_reviews.author: luvthewest

customer_reviews.title: Too tall
customer_reviews.text: Too tall for countertop use unless you are 8feet tall! Also, mine was welded incorrectly and would not stand upright. Amazon was great as always about returns.
customer_reviews.author: No Drama Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Great table top ironing board.
customer_reviews.text: When you don't have the room to store a full size ironing board, this one is perfect. It is very sturdy and well made and come with the pad and cover. Terrific product!
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for use in our motorhome. It is reasonably well made, very compact, folds flat and it suits our purpose perfectly. Would recommend to anyone for a motorhome, dorm room, or small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose. Very easy to use and store. Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ira T. Allen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: can't beleive its so good
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it actually perfect board for small apartments easy to store and the elevated stand is a plus

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small dwellings
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy and does NOT leave imprints on your fabric like others claimed,

customer_reviews.title: Board and pad are good.
customer_reviews.text: Clunky stand and iron holder. Doesn't balance well. Board and pad are good.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and they like it because it doesn't take up to much space

customer_reviews.title: This little ironing board works great in my small laundry room
customer_reviews.text: This little ironing board works great in my small laundry room. It does need some batting between under the cover. Excellent transaction.

customer_reviews.title: If you see buy it
customer_reviews.text: I had to sew I own cover!! Which worked out well.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So handy for doing small jobs when sewing. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Cute board
customer_reviews.text: I love this little ironing board. It is sturdy enough to hold my Rowenta iron with no problems. Stores away great.

customer_reviews.title: but so far it is a pretty good itwm
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it much, but so far it is a pretty good itwm.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my sewing table. It is sturdy and doesn't shift around. Glad I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and small if you don’t have a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice portable item
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice portable ironing board, it folds flat, with a clip to hold it, comes with an over-the-door hanger, and an iron rest. It takes a bit of strength to pull out the iron rest, but it certainly doesn't fall out, getting in your way when you don't want it out. Nice size surface, lightly padded board; a person could find or make an additional cover if you want more padding, but it's fine as is.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those small ironing jobs or needed touch ups
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those small ironing jobs or needed touch ups. So far I haven't had any problems with the wire mesh ironing through the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ironing board to store in a small closet. Works great!! Wife loves it!

customer_reviews.title: pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I just needed an ironing board to iron on the iron-on-velcro (cuz I can't sew). This is perfect for that. Stores well, isn't janky, no complaints. And it was good price.

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about this table is portability

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.....
customer_reviews.text: Padding is way too thin - diamond marks from the underlying grill show up easily with little iron pressure. The plastic 'feet' are very hard and slip easily on any smooth surface. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Logue

product_meta.title: Household Essentials 131210 Small Steel Table Top Ironing Board with Iron Rest | Natural Cover
product_meta.description: The Steel Mesh Tabletop Board with Iron Rest from Household Essentials fits in less space but still lets you comfortably iron your clothes. It sets up as quickly as it comes down - and hanging over the door for out-of-the-way storage. It sets up on tables, floors, the top of the washing machine and even the bed. Perfect for dorms and apartments, this compact board folds up to just 1.5 inches thick.
feature_bullets: STEEL MESH MINI ironing board that can fit on tables, counters, and flat surfaces and comes with a slide out wire shelf for your iron
COMPACT COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN makes it great for small spaces like dorms or apartments
OVER THE DOOR hook provides quick out of the way storage quick set up and take down
100 percent COTTON COVER and thick 5mm fiber pad provides a resilient, matte free ironing surface
MEASUREMENTS: Open: 8.5 inch H x 12 inch W x 30 inch L (36.5 inch L with iron rest open); Closed: 1.5 inch H x 12 inch W x 36 inch L

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars619 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
